prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a rugged exterior and bright orange accents.
I want a Pokemon that resembles ancient ruins with powerful stone arms.
Generate a legendary Pokemon that embodies the strength of mountains and rocks.
Make a creature that looks like a boulder but has fiery orange highlights.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sturdy build and a unique rock-like appearance.
Design a mythical Pokemon with a combination of gray and red colors.
Give me a Pokemon that has a solid form and a powerful presence in battle.
